content.description:
Sit start with small pinch-edge on the face, a right hand on the arete, and a right foot pasted high. From there, pull up, slap into the jug further up the arete, then follow the jugs to the boulder's apex, and mantel on top.

I am quite uncertain about the grade on this one. The first move is where the challenge lies, and the rest is a cake-walk.
content.protection: A pair of pads. The landing is very good, but there is a nasty rock in the fall zone as you approach the finish of the problem.
content.location: It climbs the northeast arete of Poe.

content.description: This starts at the pocket and moves to a left hold and right heel hook. I prefer at this point to go up the undercling with the right hand before moving to the arete. At the arete, there's a pinch and  you'll heel hook to get in position for a big move towards the top.
content.protection: The landing has trees and rocks, so a spotter and a couple pads are nice to have.

content.description: Start with a left hand undercling and right hand sidepull.
content.location: It ascends a sharp, overhung arete.

climbs.name: Never Bet the Devil Your Head

content.description:
This is a short climb that ascends an overhanging arete with desperate feet.

Sit start with a pair of small edges and tricky feet. From there, stick a right hand edge on the arete, heel hook a tiny nubbin, bump the left hand up to a sidepull, advance the right hand up to a better edge, bring the left hand along, stick the jug at the lip, and mantel on top.
content.protection: A pad will work. It has a great landing.
content.location: It climbs the southwest arete of Poe.

content.description: Sit start with a right hand on a small bump and your left hand on a sidepull. Make a powerful, balanced move, to a great pocket and finish straight up and over.
content.location: This is on the south face of Poe Block.

content.description:
Start in the same hueco as

For Evermore

. Instead of heading to the left, head straight up using underclings and positive holds. Top out.
content.location: This is on the west face of the Poe Block. Downclimb on the north side of the boulder.
